explains: v. 足够，足以；满足……的需求；有能力

sentences.en: Generally a brief note or a phone call will suffice.
sentences.cn: 通常写个便条或打个电话就足够了。

sentences.en: A cover letter should never exceed one page; often a far shorter letter will suffice.
sentences.cn: 附信绝不应超过一页；通常一封更短的信就足够了。

sentences.en: Here a single example will suffice.
sentences.cn: 这里只举一个例子就够了。
